Author: homemadeicewaterer
Text: I feel 10900% sexier and more worthy when restricting heavily. I barely ate this summer and went at it 24/7....I'm also desperately seeking satisfaction that I dont want to find in food so yea girl- we are out there. Fat and full me would rather just sleep :)

Author: ISBbaby
Text: Yes, absolutely! Dude I'm so excited to find someone else. It seems so hard to find anything online in the topic. But it's such a major turn on for my bf to control my intake, whether directly or indirectly through comments and such. Being deprived and empty and pure and whatnot has such an effect.   And I do have thoughts about starving others too tbh, but in a more complicated way.   But it's wild to connect with someone who also experiences it.
